short_summary: Supply of barrier-reared and maintained lab animals, supplies, and equipment
description: The Department of National Research Council Human Health Therapeutics has a requirement for the supply various strains and stocks of barrier-reared and maintained mice, rats, hamsters, rabbits of specific genotype, health status, sex, age, weight and pregnancy status housed and reared in compliance with CCAC Guidelines.",
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

full_summary:
**Advance Contract Award Notice - Supply of Live Animals**
===========================================================

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* **Reference Number**: cb-7095-75913835
* **Solicitation Number**: 23-58032
* **Publication Date**: 2023-07-12
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-26T14:00:00 (expired)
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-07-26

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* **UNSPSC Code**: 10100000 (Live animals)
* **GD Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* **Procurement Method**: Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Trade Agreements**: The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Delivery Information**
----------------------

* **Regions of Opportunity**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

**Contract Award Information**
---------------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Kacendra Dion
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Email: [Kacendra.Dion@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Kacendra.Dion@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 438-324-8125

**Tender Description**
----------------------

The Department of National Research Council Human Health Therapeutics requires the supply of various strains and stocks of barrier-reared and maintained mice, rats, hamsters, and rabbits of specific genotype, health status, sex, age, weight, and pregnancy status.

**Attachments**
--------------

The tender notice, including the tender description and any relevant attachments, can be found at the following URL:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7095/23
